subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Manny Ramírez said Sunday that he would agree to be traded if the deal was beneficial for him and the Red Sox, but he also added that the team would not dare trade him.
snippet: Manny Ramírez said Sunday that he would agree to be traded if the deal was beneficial for him and the Red Sox, but he also added that the team would not dare trade him.
